org.apache.flink.runtime.execution.librarycache

接口 LibraryCacheManager

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BlobLibraryCacheManager

    public interface LibraryCacheManager

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader(JobID id)
      Returns the user code class loader associated with id.
      void registerJob(JobID id, java.util.Collection<PermanentBlobKey> requiredJarFiles, java.util.Collection<java.net.URL> requiredClasspaths)
      Registers a job with its required jar files and classpaths.
      void registerTask(JobID id, ExecutionAttemptID execution, java.util.Collection<PermanentBlobKey> requiredJarFiles, java.util.Collection<java.net.URL> requiredClasspaths)
      Registers a job task execution with its required jar files and classpaths.
      void shutdown()
      Shutdown method which may release created class loaders.
      void unregisterJob(JobID id)
      Unregisters a job from the library cache manager.
      void unregisterTask(JobID id, ExecutionAttemptID execution)
      Unregisters a job task execution from the library cache manager.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getClassLoader

        java.lang.ClassLoader getClassLoader(JobID id)
        Returns the user code class loader associated with id.
        参数:
        id - identifying the job
        返回:
        ClassLoader which can load the user code

      • registerJob

        void registerJob(JobID id,
                 java.util.Collection<PermanentBlobKey> requiredJarFiles,
                 java.util.Collection<java.net.URL> requiredClasspaths)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Registers a job with its required jar files and classpaths. The jar files are identified by their blob keys and downloaded for use by a ClassLoader.
        参数:
        id - job ID
        requiredJarFiles - collection of blob keys identifying the required jar files
        requiredClasspaths - collection of classpaths that are added to the user code class loader
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs when retrieving the required jar files
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • registerTask

        void registerTask(JobID id,
                  ExecutionAttemptID execution,
                  java.util.Collection<PermanentBlobKey> requiredJarFiles,
                  java.util.Collection<java.net.URL> requiredClasspaths)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Registers a job task execution with its required jar files and classpaths. The jar files are identified by their blob keys and downloaded for use by a ClassLoader.
        参数:
        id - job ID
        requiredJarFiles - collection of blob keys identifying the required jar files
        requiredClasspaths - collection of classpaths that are added to the user code class loader
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if any error occurs when retrieving the required jar files
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • unregisterTask

        void unregisterTask(JobID id,
                    ExecutionAttemptID execution)
        Unregisters a job task execution from the library cache manager.

        Note: this is the counterpart of registerTask(JobID, ExecutionAttemptID, Collection, Collection) and it will not remove any job added via registerJob(JobID, Collection, Collection)!

        参数:
        id - job ID
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • unregisterJob

        void unregisterJob(JobID id)
        Unregisters a job from the library cache manager.

        Note: this is the counterpart of registerJob(JobID, Collection, Collection) and it will not remove any job task execution added via registerTask(JobID, ExecutionAttemptID, Collection, Collection)!

        参数:
        id - job ID
        另请参阅:
        counterpart of this method

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown method which may release created class loaders.
